title: The Knights Before Christmas
description: A humorous retelling of the classic poem Twas the Night Before Christmas --with a medieval twist!'Twas December 24th, and three brave knights were just settling in for the night when out on the drawbridge, there arose such a clatter! The knights try everything to get rid of this unknown invader (Santa Claus!), a red and white knight with a fleet of dragons . . .But nothing would stoptheir white-whiskered foe.No matter their efforts,he just would not go!This parody of Clement Clarke Moore's well-known poem 'Twas the Night Before Christmas is kid-friendly, clever, and just plain sillyâ€•sure to become a holiday classic of a different kind.A Christy Ottaviano Book
author: Joan Holub
